includedAssets.title: Welcome To The Hellmouth
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep1 - Welcome To The Hellmouth
includedAssets.synopsis: Buffy Summers faces her destiny as a slayer of the undead, and tries to make friends at a new school in Sunnydale.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Buffy Summers faces her destiny as a slayer of the undead, and tries to make friends at a new school in Sunnydale.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Buffy Summers faces her destiny as a slayer of the undead, and tries to make friends at a new school in Sunnydale.

includedAssets.title: The Harvest
includedAssets.synopsis: Buffy and her friends encounter a powerful vampire bent on opening a portal to a dimension inhabited by demons.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Buffy and her friends encounter a powerful vampire bent on opening a portal to a dimension inhabited by demons.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Buffy and her friends encounter a powerful vampire bent on opening a portal to a dimension inhabited by demons.

includedAssets.title: Witch
includedAssets.synopsis: A witch attempts to eliminate Buffy from a cheerleading competition.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A witch attempts to eliminate Buffy from a cheerleading competition.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A witch attempts to eliminate Buffy from a cheerleading competition.

includedAssets.title: Teacher's Pet
includedAssets.synopsis: Xander falls for his substitute biology teacher - who just happens to be a giant praying mantis in disguise...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Xander falls for his substitute biology teacher - who just happens to be a giant praying mantis in disguise...
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Xander falls for his substitute biology teacher - who just happens to be a giant praying mantis in disguise...

includedAssets.title: Never Kill A Boy On The First Date
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep5 - Never Kill A Boy On The First Date
includedAssets.synopsis: While Buffy awaits the arrival of a warrior vampire, she dates a boy who is attracted to her exciting lifestyle.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Buffy awaits the arrival of a warrior vampire, she dates a boy who is attracted to her exciting lifestyle.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Buffy awaits the arrival of a warrior vampire, she dates a boy who is attracted to her exciting lifestyle.

includedAssets.title: The Pack
includedAssets.synopsis: Xander and several other students are possessed by the spirit of a demonic breed of hyenas that wreak havoc at the high school.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Xander and several other students are possessed by the spirit of a demonic breed of hyenas that wreak havoc at the high school.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Xander and several other students are possessed by the spirit of a demonic breed of hyenas that wreak havoc at the high school.

includedAssets.title: Angel
includedAssets.synopsis: After they share an unexpected moment of passion, Buffy discovers Angel's horrifying secret.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: After they share an unexpected moment of passion, Buffy discovers Angel's horrifying secret.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: After they share an unexpected moment of passion, Buffy discovers Angel's horrifying secret.

includedAssets.title: I Robot...You Jane
includedAssets.synopsis: Willow unwittingly unleashes a powerful demon that takes refuge on the Internet.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Willow unwittingly unleashes a powerful demon that takes refuge on the Internet.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Willow unwittingly unleashes a powerful demon that takes refuge on the Internet.

includedAssets.title: The Puppet Show
includedAssets.synopsis: Buffy suspects that a ventriloquist's dummy may be harvesting organs from classmates performing in a talent show.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Buffy suspects that a ventriloquist's dummy may be harvesting organs from classmates performing in a talent show.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Buffy suspects that a ventriloquist's dummy may be harvesting organs from classmates performing in a talent show.

includedAssets.title: Nightmares
includedAssets.synopsis: Buffy and her friends discover that their worst nightmares have become a reality.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Buffy and her friends discover that their worst nightmares have become a reality.

includedAssets.title: Out Of Mind, Out Of Sight
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep11 - Out Of Mind, Out Of Sight
includedAssets.synopsis: As the May Queen election approaches, an invisible force attacks Cordelia's closest friends.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As the May Queen election approaches, an invisible force attacks Cordelia's closest friends.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As the May Queen election approaches, an invisible force attacks Cordelia's closest friends.

includedAssets.title: Prophecy Girl
includedAssets.synopsis: Giles discovers an ancient book foretelling of Buffy's death at the hands of The Master.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Giles discovers an ancient book foretelling of Buffy's death at the hands of The Master.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Giles discovers an ancient book foretelling of Buffy's death at the hands of The Master.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: Buffy Summers discovers she is the latest in a long line of young women destined to protect Earth from vampires. First season of the acclaimed teen fantasy drama starring Sarah Michelle Gellar.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Buffy Summers discovers she is the latest in a long line of young women destined to slay vampires. First season of the acclaimed teen fantasy drama.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Buffy Summers discovers she is the latest in a long line of young women destined to protect Earth from vampires. First season of the acclaimed teen fantasy drama starring Sarah Michelle Gellar.

includedAssets.title: Season 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Buffy returns to Sunnydale, but her new attitude quickly puts herself and her friends in extreme danger. Second season of the fantasy classic starring Sarah Michelle Gellar.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Buffy is back, but her attitude quickly puts herself and her friends in danger. Second season of the fantasy classic starring Sarah Michelle Gellar.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Buffy returns to Sunnydale, but her new attitude quickly puts herself and her friends in extreme danger. Second season of the fantasy classic starring Sarah Michelle Gellar.

includedAssets.title: Season 3
includedAssets.synopsis: Buffy finds herself at odds with the Watchers' Council, just as a charismatic but deadly new enemy emerges. Third season of the teen fantasy drama from the mind of Joss Whedon (Avengers Assemble).
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Buffy finds herself at odds with the Watchers' Council, just as a charming but deadly foe emerges. Third season of the fantasy drama from Joss Whedon.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Buffy finds herself at odds with the Watchers' Council, just as a charismatic but deadly new enemy emerges. Third season of the teen fantasy drama from the mind of Joss Whedon (Avengers Assemble).

includedAssets.title: Season 4
includedAssets.synopsis: As Buffy and Willow enrol at college, the Scooby Gang begin to get some help from an unexpected source. Fourth season of Joss Whedon's hit fantasy drama starring Sarah Michelle Gellar and Alyson Hannigan.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Buffy enrols at college, the Scooby Gang get some help from an unexpected source. Joss Whedon's hit fantasy drama starring Sarah Michelle Gellar.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Buffy and Willow enrol at college, the Scooby Gang begin to get some help from an unexpected source. Fourth season of Joss Whedon's hit fantasy drama starring Sarah Michelle Gellar and Alyson Hannigan.

includedAssets.title: Season 5
includedAssets.synopsis: There's a sudden new addition to the Scooby Gang as they attempt to protect a key to Hell from an exiled goddess. Fifth season of the acclaimed teen fantasy drama from Avengers Assemble writer-director Joss Whedon. Sarah Michelle Gellar stars.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: There's a new addition to the gang as they protect a key to Hell from an exiled goddess. Fifth season of the cult hit starring Sarah Michelle Gellar.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: There's a sudden new addition to the Scooby Gang as they attempt to protect a key to Hell from an exiled goddess. Fifth season of the acclaimed teen fantasy drama from Avengers Assemble writer-director Joss Whedon. Sarah Michelle Gellar stars.

includedAssets.title: Season 6
includedAssets.synopsis: Buffy faces her most difficult test yet as the Scooby Gang struggle to hold themselves together in this sixth season of the fantasy drama starring Sarah Michelle Gellar.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Buffy faces her most difficult test yet as the Scooby Gang begins to crumble in this sixth season of the fantasy drama starring Sarah Michelle Gellar.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Buffy faces her most difficult test yet as the Scooby Gang struggle to hold themselves together in this sixth season of the fantasy drama starring Sarah Michelle Gellar.

includedAssets.title: Season 7
includedAssets.synopsis: Buffy and the Scoobies are aided by a team of potential new Slayers as they try to save the world from evil one last time in this seventh and final season of Joss Whedon's hit fantasy drama.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Buffy and the Scoobies are aided by a team of potential new Slayers as they try to save the world in this final season of Joss Whedon's fantasy drama.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Buffy and the Scoobies are aided by a team of potential new Slayers as they try to save the world from evil one last time in this seventh and final season of Joss Whedon's hit fantasy drama.

includedIn.title: Buffy The Vampire Slayer
includedIn.synopsis: Teenager Buffy Summers discovers she is destined to battle vampires, demons and other forces of darkness as the latest in a long line of “Slayers”. Along with her circle of loyal friends, the “Scooby Gang”, Buffy deals with her life as mankind’s defence against the undead.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Teenager Buffy Summers discovers she is destined to battle vampires, demons and other forces of darkness as the latest in a long line of “Slayers”.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: Teenager Buffy Summers discovers she is destined to battle vampires, demons and other forces of darkness as the latest in a long line of “Slayers”. Along with her circle of loyal friends, the “Scooby Gang”, Buffy deals with her life as mankind’s defence against the undead.

title: Buffy The Vampire Slayer Seasons 1-7
synopsis: Buffy Summers (Sarah Michelle Gellar) is the latest in a long line of Slayers: young women destined to protect Earth from supernatural evil. Together with her group of misfit friends, she fights against the very worst Hell and humanity has to throw at her. Cult teen fantasy drama from Avengers Assemble writer-director Joss Whedon.
shortSynopsis: Buffy Summers, together with her group of misfit friends, fights to save Earth from supernatural evil. Cult fantasy drama from Joss Whedon.
mediumSynopsis: Buffy Summers (Sarah Michelle Gellar) is the latest in a long line of Slayers: young women destined to protect Earth from supernatural evil. Together with her group of misfit friends, she fights against the very worst Hell and humanity has to throw at her. Cult teen fantasy drama from Avengers Assemble writer-director Joss Whedon.
guidanceText: flashing images, strong language, mature themes, sex, violence
